summary: On the last day before high school sophomore Akira moves to Tokyo to join another school, a bizarre love quadrangle develops between her old schoolmates Nao, Gaku, Tamaki and her, one which must be resolved in an archery duel.
cast: Mark Chinnery|Yuria Haga|Takami Mizuhashi|Kazunori Sasaki|Ryûya Wakaba
title: Koi suru nichiyobi
